B.1.351.description: A lineage first identified in South Africa and defined by new variant of concern 501Y.V2 - A more detailed description of the lineage is here and a preprint describing the variant is here.

B.1.1.7.description: Initially a UK lineage, associated with a variant of concern with N501Y, P681H and numerous other mutations. Evidence of having higher transmissibility than other lineage resulting in rapid growth in the UK and internationally.

P.1.description: A lineage first identified in Brazil with variants of biological significance E484K, N501Y and K417T, described in a recent virological post: here. P.1 lineage is an alias of lineage B.1.1.28.1. As described in Rambaut et al., 2020 when the lineage heirarchy reaches a certain depth (length of 5) lineage names are given an alias to prevent them from becoming infinitely long.

B.1.617.2.description: A lineage circulating with variants of biological significance S:P681R and S:L452R, first detected in India and international cases with travel history from India. Designated through GitHub issues https://github.com/cov-lineages/pango-designation/issues/38 and https://github.com/cov-lineages/pango-designation/issues/49

A.23.1.description: International lineage with variants of biological significance F157L, V367F, Q613H and P681R, described fully in the preprent: Bugembe et al 2021. Q613H is predicted to be functionally equivalent to the D614G mutation that arose early in 2020.

B.1.525.description: International lineage with variants of biological significance E484K, Q677H, F888L and a similar suite of deletions to B.1.1.7.
